lead_paragraph: Yongda, a Chinese luxury auto dealer, will provide Uber’s partners discounts on new car purchases, financing and services after the sale.

headline.main: Uber Signs Financing Accord With Chinese Car Dealership
headline.print_headline: Uber Signs Financing Accord With Chinese Car Dealership

snippet: Yongda, a Chinese luxury auto dealer, will provide Uber’s partners discounts on new car purchases, financing and services after the sale.
